overview: With some of Cuba's finest young musicians by his side, Pio Leiva -- regarded as the oldest "Master of Son" in his native country -- performs a selection of classic tracks in his signature vocal style. Songs include "Nadie Baila Como Yo," "Doble Personalidad," "Mi Chiquita Quiere Bailar," "Guantanamera," "Lario Lario," "Lleg√≥ el Guajiro de Cunagua," "Que Es Lo Que Cae," "Chiki Chaka," "Le Canta a la Vida," "Mala Lengua" and "Anabacoa."
title: Pio Leiva: Live in Amsterdam
